head.title: block-closing-brace-empty-line-before
head.description: block-closing-brace-empty-line-before Require or disallow an empty line before the closing brace of blocks. Options string: "always-multi…

body:
#block-closing-brace-empty-line-before

Require or disallow an empty line before the closing brace of blocks.

a {
  color: pink;
  /* ← */
} /* ↑ */
/**  ↑
 * This line */

#Options

string: "always-multi-line"|"never"

#always-multi-line

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  color: pink;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  color: pink;

}
a { color: pink; }

#never

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  color: pink;

}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  color: pink;
}
a { color: pink; }
